meanings.definition: A plant of the daisy family, with purple coneflowers.
meanings.sent1: The echinacea in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy growing echinacea for its pretty flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the echinacea, thinking it was a floral paradise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of echinacea in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The purple petals of the echinacea danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: A dietary supplement made from the echinacea plant, believed to boost the immune system.
meanings.sent1: She took echinacea daily to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Echinacea is known for its potential immune-boosting properties.
meanings.sent3: The echinacea supplement was like a shield for her immune system.
meanings.sent4: His energy soared after starting a regimen of echinacea.
meanings.sent5: The echinacea capsules gleamed like tiny health warriors in the bottle.
